name: Twig n Berries
description:
Twig n Berries is an endless runner game created by Angry Chicken Games.

Super easy to play, and loads of fun game for all ages.
Navigate Twig through obstacles in the field, while gathering Berries, to increase your score!

• HOW TO PLAY
- Touch anywhere on the screen to make Twig fly
- Release your touch, and Twig will run along the field.
- Fence posts and lightning will zap Twig and end the round.
- There is only one life, don't wast it trying to be crazy.

• FEATURES
- Beautiful effects for a simple runner game!
- Play easily and quickly.

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere

• NO WIFI? NOT A PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime you have a few minutes to beat your high score

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects

• SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
- Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)

• NOTES
- Twig n Berries contains interstitial targeted ads to provide a better play experience.
